name: git-env-branches
description: Provides visual overview of the current, real-time (environment) branch merge state of the current repository

scripts.local:install:
npm ci && npm run build && npm pack && npm i -g git-env-branches-0.1.0.tgz && rm git-env-branches-0.1.0.tgz && echo '
Go to a local repo, and run "git-env-branches -h" for options'

author: Robin van het Hof
